title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1647-7.1 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1647-7.1 - General

State Regulations
(a) Time of
closing. The books of account shall be closed during the operating period at
the end of each fiscal year beginning with the fiscal year in which the date of
substantial completion falls. The closing of the income and expense analysis
ledgers at the end of the initial operating period has been described in
section
1646-6.4
(a). (b) References to accounts. In the
instructions that follow all references to the income accounts mean the
accounts within the 3000 group of accounts. References to the expense accounts
mean the accounts within the 4000 and 6000 groups. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1647-7.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
